attributes.action: Stop the use of LCP through the High Court granting a prohibitory injunction
attributes.additional_details: We wish to stop the use of Liverpool Care Pathway through the High Court granting a prohibitory injunction  to stop the use of the LCP as it is a violation of a family's rights under Article 8 of the EU convention on human rights as the intervention of the LCP does not respect family values.We want the government to stop the use of Liverpool Care Pathway in all acute hospitals with immediate effect.

rejection.details: Please see: Suspend the Use of Liverpool Care Pathways Until a Full inquiry is done
